Author: marlborofag
Text: you’re so sweet, thank you! i don’t actually think i’m gonna poo myself LOL the thought just keeps freaking me out and i thought i’d make a dumb post. im honestly probably gonna throw the rest of the lax out tomorrow - screw those things!

Author: Phantasmortuary
Text: I'm so sorry you're dealing with this right now. Finding ways to make yourself as comfortable as possible may help. I'm assuming you must be familiar with the symptoms.  Hydration, while overlooked often, is something the body appreciates. Especially, after ordeals like that.  I hope your beginning of the week ends up going better, and lacks the physical and mental pains from today. ✨
